body:
Hey everyone, I've been seeing a few discussions about streaming, but WHAT actually is it?
I know it might sound obvious, like a video stream, but the thing is i have a YouTube channel for my own and this could be a possibility for me in future, so what is streaming and how do you do it?


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ad0ID1R2iak&list=UU6qZ9vdryr7m-4sS0i9kL3Q

title: What Exactly Is Streaming?

replies.body: Livestreaming. on twitch. And you can get a software to stream or link your Twitch with your mojang account.
replies.body_tagged: Livestreaming. on twitch. And you can get a software to stream or link your Twitch with your mojang account.

replies.body: oohhh okay, so you can stream a video of whatever and it will upload to 'Twitch'?
replies.body_tagged: oohhh okay, so you can stream a video of whatever and it will upload to 'Twitch'?

reply_to.body: Livestreaming. on twitch. And you can get a software to stream or link your Twitch with your mojang account.
reply_to.body_tagged: Livestreaming. on twitch. And you can get a software to stream or link your Twitch with your mojang account.

replies.body: It's when you stream yourself playing or doing anything live, usually through twitch.
replies.body_tagged: It's when you stream yourself playing or doing anything live, usually through twitch.
